name: Transfer Regeneration
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Monster Codex © 2014, Paizo Inc.
text: You bestow your regenerative abilities on the target. Your regeneration stops functioning for the duration of the spell, and the target gains your regeneration. For example, if you have regeneration 5 (acid or fire), your target gains regeneration 5 (acid or fire). This regeneration overlaps (does not stack) with any regeneration the creature already has, including other castings of this spell. This spell has no effect if you don't have the regeneration ability or your regeneration isn't functioning when you cast the spell.
text_zh: 你将自己的再生能力转移到法术的目标身上。在法术的持续期间，你自己的再生能力停止运作，但法术的目标则获得你的再生能力。举例来说，如果你拥有再生5（强酸或火焰），那么你的目标就会再法术生效期间获得再生5（强酸或火焰）。这些再生能力可以和目标拥有的其他再生能力，包括来自本法术的再生能力同时存在（但无法与同种再生能力叠加）。如果施法者本身不具有再生能力或是在施放本法术时他的再生能力无法生效，那么本法术无效。
